name: Time Storm
description:
You have the ability to go back to the last checkpoint and all the moves you made before it will be saved and repeated by your self past.Use it wisely to get through the Time Storm.

Jump Across rooftops
Move Cranes
Avoid Electrical Wires
Push Boxes to Reach Higher Places
Collect the Power to Time Travel

SImply put, get a helping hand from your past self to reach the checkpoints.

Features

  • Overcome 30+ puzzles with increasing complexity.
  • jump on the head of your past self to get a better jump.
  • Enjoy the beautiful view of the storm over the rooftops in the neon city.
